full_summary:
### Request for Information (RFI) for Integrated Security System (ISS)

#### Background
Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) and Service Canada (SC) are seeking to implement a new commercial off-the-shelf Integrated Security System (ISS) to ensure the safety of employees and visitors to ESDC's offices and service centers across Canada.

#### Procurement Details
- **Contract Number**: WS3833148654-Doc4330114852
- **Publication Date**: 2023-11-29
- **Deadline for Bids**: 2023-12-29T14:00:00
- **Location**: National Capital Region (NCR)

#### Technical Requirements
The ISS should be a cloud-based software solution with the ability to integrate with various security systems, including cameras, alarms, and access control systems. The system should also include features such as real-time monitoring, video recording, and alert notifications.

#### Procurement Method
The procurement will be conducted through a competitive and open bidding process, following the provisions of the applicable trade agreements, including the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

#### Contracting Entities
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Department End-User**: Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC)

#### Contact Information
For more information or to obtain a copy of the tender document, please contact Scott Endicott, (scott.endicott@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

#### Availability
The tender document can be accessed through the following link: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18142712?extsite=MTgxNDI3MTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18142712?extsite=MTgxNDI3MTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18142712?extsite=MTgxNDI3MTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18142712?extsite=MTgxNDI3MTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
